task_summary: Detect the red object and push it to a new position on the table, then retreat.

task_long_description.overview: A UR-style manipulator operates over a small white table containing several items: a blue can, an orange bottle, a red rectangular block (the target), a purple can, a translucent cup, and a green bottle. The instruction is to move the red object without grasping it. The robot should perceive the target, approach and align its end-effector, verify visibility/alignment, execute a controlled push to translate the block toward a new location, briefly stabilize, and retreat to a safe height. The action is constrained to table-top contact and must avoid disturbing nearby objects.
preconditions: Camera view provides the red object in scene
Table surface is clear for a short push path
stepwise_plan: Detect the red object with retries.
Open gripper and approach/align to push face.
Move above with a small offset and verify visibility.
Push the red object along a shallow diagonal.
Pause briefly to settle and then retreat.
success_criteria: Red object position changes noticeably from its start pose
No grasp required; motion achieved via push
Robot returns to a safe, non-contact pose
failure_and_recovery: Object slips or blocked: attempt a shorter or repeated push
task_long_description.termination: Tree succeeds once push is executed and retreat completes without faults.

frame_3.now_evidence: End-effector aligned above target; pre-push pose visible.
frame_3.predicts_next: Confirms that a push actuation should follow.

node_specs.description: Detect red object with retry wrapper.
Open gripper to make a pushing contact safe.
Move to a small height above the target.
Verify the red object is visible/aligned.
Execute the push to translate the object.
Allow settling time after the push.
Back off to a safe pose.

assumptions: “Red object” refers to the red rectangular block visible in the frames.
Movement is achieved via pushing (no grasp).
Push direction approximated as 120° in the table frame; exact dataset frame is not provided.

expected_success_criteria: Block final pose differs from initial by >5 cm
Robot completes retreat without contact faults
